verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: Also] , [ARG0: readers] [V: take] [ARG1: issue with Sen. Coons ' gun control talk at a school ; Trump 's treatment of Russia ; and the environmental impact of eating meat] .
Also , readers take issue with Sen. Coons ' gun control talk at a school ; Trump 's treatment of Russia ; and the environmental impact of [V: eating] [ARG1: meat] .
